ovdesc.p: Definitions of new script groups using which the scripts can be grouped and reused. Grouping various related scripts so that the same script can be re-used in different sequence for a different end use.

desc.p: Description of the purpose of the script. This should cover the very purpose for which this script is used for testing. Between 3 and 35 characters allowed, no special editing will be done.
The Id used to group the scripts. This id will be used in SEAT.SCRIPTS application in SCRIPT.GROUP field . Between 1 and 16 characters allowed, no special editing will be done.
